name: x1 vs. the vector space
description: X1 vs. the Vector Space is an aspiring top-down shooter set in a strange world of euclidean mathematics, where the player is tasked with battling the ever growing hordes of armed vectors whose sole purpose is to see the player nullified. The randomly generated worlds contain progressively stronger enemies, armed with more power the further you venture in. Choose to fight in the exponentially tougher Solo mode, or ask a friend to help you in Local co-op. If that is not enough, you can test your skills in Versus mode to determine who is the ultimate vector once and for all!
